lead_paragraph: C.O. Bigelow has a loyal following in the West Village in Manhattan and is considered by some to be the oldest pharmacy in the United States, opening in 1838.

headline.main: Bustling Village Apothecary, Unchained by Time

snippet: C.O. Bigelow has a loyal following in the West Village in Manhattan and is considered by some to be the oldest pharmacy in the United States, opening in 1838....
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on CO Bigelow, West Village apothecary whose history dates back to 1838; family-owned store has loyal following, with regulars traveling from other boroughs to fill prescriptions, get pharmaceutical advice or browse inventory of almost 500 beauty brands.
